artist: Designer: Nancy Skolos; Designer: Thomas Wedell
creditline: Gift of Wells Fargo Bank, Minnesota
description: Surrealist image with text of various styles and type fonts; old-fashioned camera at top; orange and blue funnels; chrome tubes in impossible perspectives; frame elements at LLC and URC

42 3/4 x 31 in. (108.59 x 78.74 cm) (outer frame)
provenance: Wells Fargo Bank, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2009
title: A Technical Nightmare Brought to You by Laserscan
